course.unavailable: The stream has not started yet. Please try again closer to the event start time.
settings.ui.media.profile.classroom.desc: If you are in the lecture hall, the slides for your attended course will not be displayed. You still have the opportunity to send text messages and take part in quizzes, if this is offered in the course.
settings.ui.media.profile.home.descripti: If you are following a course from home, you will see the slides presented. Additionally, if offered in the course, you can send text messages and take quizzes.
settings.api.token.copy.note: Make sure to copy your personal access token now. You won't be able to see it again!
settings.api.token.description: Generate a personal access token for access to the lectureStreaming API. To be able to stream your content from lecturePresenter you need an access token to authenticate lecturePresenter to the API.
settings.api.token.warn: Please note that generating a new access token will invalidate the previous one.
settings.audio.feedback.description: This echo test will let you quickly check that your microphone and speakers are working.
settings.audio.speaker: Speaker
settings.title: Device settings
devices.init.once: You only have to make this setting once.
devices.camera.blocked: Access to camera not possible. Make sure that no other application is accessing this camera.
devices.speaker: Speaker
devices.audio.input.init: For a speech, you need to select a microphone and give the browser permission to use it.
devices.audio.rec.test.description: The recording is only cached locally in the browser.
devices.audio.permission: You need to grant permission to access audio devices.
devices.video.permission: You need to grant permission to access video devices.
devices.video.blocked: Access to camera not possible. Make sure that no other application is accessing this camera.
layout.speaker: Speaker
course.feature.message.send.error.connec: Connection Error: Failed to send message
course.feature.message.send.error.recipi: Participant not available: Failed to send message
course.feature.message.delete.error.conn: Connection Error: Failed to delete message
course.feature.message.sent: Your message has been successfully sent
course.feature.message.deleted: Your message has been successfully deleted
course.feature.message.edited: Your message has been successfully edited
course.feature.message.edit.error.connec: Connection Error: Failed to edit message
course.feature.participant.ban.not-allow: You are not allowed to ban participants
course.feature.quiz.count.error: Only one answer per quiz is allowed
course.feature.quiz.sent: Your answer has been successfully sent
course.form.access.passcode.help: Enter a passcode that will be required to join this course.
course.form.access.visibility.label: Hide course from course list
course.form.access.visibility.help: If the course is hidden, it will not be displayed to any user in the course list. Users can still access it via any access link.
course.form.access.access-link.descripti: Generate multiple links for this course to provide participants with access to the course stream, granted they possess the required permissions and/or the passcode.
course.form.access.access-link.alias.hel: The alias is optional. If you do not specify an alias, a random one will be generated.
course.form.access.access-link.expiry.he: The expiry date time is optional. If you do not specify an expiry date time, the access link will never expire.
course.form.access.access-link.default.h: This is the default access link used on the course page, and it cannot be deleted.
course.form.description.title: Title
course.form.description.title.help: The title must be at least three characters long.
course.form.user.management.help: Assign additional course roles to individual participants. In the Email address field, specify the primary email address of participants who will receive extended privileges for this course.
course.form.user.management.name: Name
course.form.user.management.csv.help: Select a role to be assigned to the imported participants. Individual participants can be removed from the import via the table.
import.users.title: Import Participants
course.privilege.course.alter.privileges: Change roles and privileges of participants
course.privilege.chat.write: Send chat messages to all participants
course.privilege.chat.write.privately: Send chat messages to specific participants
course.privilege.participants.ban: Can ban participants of the course
course.speech.request.accepted.descripti: Start your speech now or cancel it if you have changed your mind.
course.recorded.modal.title: This course is being recorded
course.recorded.modal.message: The recording can be published later. As a digital event, this affects your contributions during active requests to speak.
course.no_access.title: You are not allowed to access this course.
course.no_access.description: You do not have access to this course. Please contact the organizers.
course.moderation.toast.permanent_banned: You have been permanently banned from the course
If you have any questions, please contact the organizers.
entry.modal.title: Start media playback
entry.modal.description: To play audio and video, click Start.
entry.device.modal.title: Permission required
entry.device.modal.description: To join the conference, you must grant permission to access your microphone.
entry.device.modal.not.allowed: Unable to access microphone. This can have the following causes:
entry.device.modal.not.allowed.reason1: No microphone is connected or the drivers are not installed.
entry.device.modal.not.allowed.reason2: You have denied access once and it is still denied.
reconnect.title: Connection interrupted
stats.title: Statistics
camera.error.not.allowed.message: You must grant permission to access the camera.
camera.error.not.readable.title: Access to camera not possible
camera.error.not.readable.message: Please make sure that no other application is accessing the same camera device.
screenshare.error.not.allowed.title: Screen share canceled
screenshare.error.not.allowed.message: You must grant permission to access screen sharing.
sort.by.first.name: First Name
sort.by.last.name: Last Name
vpn.required.title: Network Access
vpn.required.description: In order to be able to watch streamed courses, you must have network access to the data network of the TU Darmstadt. All TU members have the following network access options:
vpn.required.description.vpn: Secure connection into the TU network and access to services outside of the TU data network.
vpn.required.description.wlan: Nearly full-coverage Internet access on campus and in the “darmstadtium” congress center.
vpn.required.reconnect: Please reload the page after the connection has been successfully established.
page.error.404.description: Sorry, the page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved
